description: Connect to Google's generative AI embeddings service using the GoogleGenerativeAIEmbeddings class, found in the langchain-google-genai package.

model_name.info: The name of the Google Generative AI embedding model to use (e.g., models/text-embedding-004).

errors.min_dimension: Output dimensionality must be at least 1
errors.max_dimension: Output dimensionality cannot exceed {max}. Google's embedding models only support dimensions up to {max}.

logs.building_embeddings: Building Google Generative AI embeddings with model: {model}
logs.documents_embedded: All documents embedded successfully - Total: {total} embedding(s)
logs.embedding_query: Embedding query - Text length: {text_length} characters, Dimensionality: {dimensionality}
logs.embeddings_built: Google Generative AI embeddings instance created successfully
logs.ready: Google Generative AI Embeddings ready with model: {model}
